/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC    -shared -Wl,-soname,libbase_simple_controller.so -o /home/win/handsfree/devel/lib/libbase_simple_controller.so CMakeFiles/base_simple_controller.dir/src/base_simple_controller.cpp.o /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libclass_loader.so -lPocoFoundation -ldl /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libroslib.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librospack.so -lpython2.7 -lboost_program_options -ltinyxml /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librealtime_tools.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libtf.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libtf2_ros.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libactionlib.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libmessage_filters.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libroscpp.so -lboost_signals -lboost_filesystem /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libtf2.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libroscpp_serialization.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole_log4cxx.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole_backend_interface.so -llog4cxx -lboost_regex /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librostime.so -lboost_date_time /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libcpp_common.so -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lpthread -lconsole_bridge -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/indigo/lib
